sentence.Network_en: Don't ever use any other type of carabiner for belaying.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要用其他的锁做保护.

sentence.Network_en: The responsible dealer will have information on carabiner strength.
sentence.Network_cn: 销售商应该有铁锁负重量的信息.

sentence.Network_en: The carabiner must not be obstructed, any pressure from the rock reduces its strength.
sentence.Network_cn: 锁不能被岩石或者挂片阻碍, 任何来自岩石的压力都会降低锁的强度.
